tool_description: Download any video or mp3 from youtube and other site, also you can use youtube api
name: Youtube and other site Converter, Downloader + Youtube Api
title: Youtube and other site Converter, Downloader + Youtube Api
tool_name: Youtube and other site Converter, Downloader + Youtube Api

api_list.name: YoutubeAPI - search playlist
api_list.description: Search any playlist on youtube by term

api_list.name: YoutubeAPI - get info of a channel
api_list.description: Getting info of any youtube channel

api_list.name: Server Status
api_list.description: Getting usage of CPU, disk space usage and RAM usage in percentage of server

api_list.name: YoutubeAPI - search videos
api_list.description: Search videos on youtube by term

api_list.name: YoutubeAPI - get info of a playlist
api_list.description: Get info of any youtube playlist

api_list.name: YoutubeAPI - get info of a video
api_list.description: Getting info of any video of youtube by ID

optional_parameters.name: responseFormat
optional_parameters.description:
Use for change output format of API response
default is json, but you can choose XML format by insert value \"xml\"

api_list.name: Status of Process
api_list.description: When you have created a new process, you will get and ID of process and you can use in this endpoint for check the status

optional_parameters.name: responseFormat
optional_parameters.description:
Use for change output format of API response
default is json, but you can choose XML format by insert value \"xml\"

api_list.name: Create new Process
api_list.description: Start processing for download and conversion file

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Enter the url of page where you need to donwload the media

optional_parameters.name: volume
optional_parameters.description:
Enter a value from 1 to 10
for grow up the volume on the audio file
Is optional.

optional_parameters.name: responseFormat
optional_parameters.description:
Use for change output format of API response
default is json, but you can choose XML format by insert value \"xml\"

optional_parameters.name: regenerate
optional_parameters.description:
use this parameter if a file is already downloaded and you want to regenerate the file
(normaly you need too use only if something goes wrong in a conversion file)

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description:
enter the format of file in output
default is \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"mp3\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"
also you can choose \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"video\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"

optional_parameters.name: stop
optional_parameters.description: If you want to cut video or audio insert the second value , and the audio or video will terminate at that second.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description:
If you want to cut the video or audio, insert a second when you plan to start the audio
value is optional, but if you insert start parameter, you must enter the stop parameter too
